attributes.review: So first off, I started to download this app and it didn’t finish downloading until 2 days later 🤦‍♀️. After it finally downloaded I was so excited to get on the app but when I opened it up it asked me a lot of personal information. I wasn’t sure why it needed my photos or my emails etc. so I proceeded to click no. When I did, it froze for a couple of seconds and my phone COMPLETELY turned off. When I turned it back on everything on my phone was ruined with all kinds of viruses. It had sent everyone I know awful mean things, very sexist and racist may I add, and then presumed to say underneath trump 2020. When I was checking everything else my photos was all gone and was replaced by 600 pictures of Donald trumps fake tan. I had to go and get my phone professionally worked on because of this app. DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
